Schools.Name: Kansas State University
Schools.Degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

Details: Developed and maintained the member management platform using Ruby on Rails and Angular.
Integrated data from separate systems to extend the platform.
Built configuration driven UI to allow users to import external data from multiple systems.
Developed and maintained mobile app for iOS and Android using Ionic.
Implemented registration system to allow club owners to register for events online.
Rewrote score entry app to be mobile friendly using ASP.NET and AngularJS.
Developed chromecast app to display live Scoreboards.
Integrated third-party camera software into desktop applications.
Developed Google App Engine tools to manage bug reports and releases.
Transitioned version control from SVN to Git.
Developed internal site for use within a classroom using ASP.NET.
Coordinated with Biology department to determine the site's look.

Orgs.Name: Association of Computing Machinery
Details: Helped put together and setup events throughout the year
Tutored students in Computer Science topics.

Orgs.Name: Game Development Club
Orgs.Position: Event Manager, Web Manager, Team Leader
Details: Helped organize the club for its first semester.
Lead a team of peers to plan, develop, and present a game during the semester.
Organize and promote events such as an AI programming competition.
Developed a web site for the club to use to present games.
